ValidationRule.description: Ensure that the activation case is compliant with the signed contract before progressing the activation case.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: RecordType.DeveloperName ="Order_Fulfilment_Case" && ISBLANK(TEXT(Contract_compliant__c)) && ( ISPICKVAL(Status, "Setup billing") || ISPICKVAL(Status, "Plan delivery") || ISPICKVAL(Status, "Build solution") || ISPICKVAL(Status, "Onboarding and training") || ISPICKVAL(Status, "Time registration") || ISPICKVAL(Status, "Closed") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must check that the activation case is within a 10% margin of the contractual agreement. Select "Contract compliant" Yes or No.
